title: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Module: Project-Based Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of secondary school-level foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning support via digital devices with periodic feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to define and analyze problems mathematically through project-based tasks.
Learners achieve over 80% conceptual understanding using self-assessment tools provided in online learning modules.
Learners present and improve their mathematical reasoning processes three or more times in peer feedback sessions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
